cards.name: Ceiling Crawl
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Stitch moves up to 3 spaces ignoring terrain.

cards.name: Genetic Reflexes
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Cancel an attack that just hit Stitch, then move 1 space.

cards.name: Plasma Spit
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Push an enemy 1 space; Stitch may follow into the vacated space.

cards.name: Berserker Bite
cards.rulesText: cost 1PP — Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Talon Slash
cards.rulesText: cost 1PP — Deal 2 damage; if the enemy is damaged, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Pounce
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Leap 2 spaces to an enemy and become adjacent.

cards.name: Improvised Blaster
cards.rulesText: cost 1MP — Range 2; deal 1 damage and push the target 1 space.

cards.name: Dirty Tricks
cards.rulesText: cost 2MP — Swap positions with an adjacent enemy; that enemy's next attack is –2.

cards.name: Sneaky Taunt
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP — Target enemy discards a random card.

cards.name: Quadruple-Arms Maul
cards.rulesText: cost 1PP/2MP — Move 2 spaces, then deal 3 damage to each adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Roll & Slam
cards.rulesText: cost 1PP/1MP — Move 1 space and deal 2 damage; Stitch takes no retaliation.

cards.name: 360 Spin Kick
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/1MP — Push each adjacent enemy 1 space away.

cards.name: Experiment 626 Rampage
cards.rulesText: cost 1PP/1SP/2MP — Deal 4 damage to one enemy; then Stitch may move 3 spaces.

cards.name: Small but Savage
cards.rulesText: cost 2MP — Move through a larger enemy's space; that enemy takes 1 damage and is stunned this turn.
